components.name: Backup as a Service || Managed Veeam for VMware Cloud Director
Backup as a Service || Veeam Backup Managed
Backup as a Service || Veeam Enterprise
Identity, Security & Operations || Key Management Service

incident_updates.body: We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Veeam offer. Start time : 10/04/2025 07:00 UTC End time : 10/04/2025 15:00 UTC Service impact : Veeam Enterprise service will be down during the maintenance. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for our Veeam Enterprise product. Thank you for your understanding.

scheduled_maintenances.name: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - Host replacement maintenance notification

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. This may temporarily affect the availability of vMotion. Start time : 14/04/2025 07:00 UTC End time : 18/04/2025 15:00 UTC Service impact : Concerned hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the operation and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our Hosted Private Cloud offer, we will be replacing Hosted Private Cloud's hosts by new ones. Concerned customers will receive a notification regarding the replacement of their hosts. Thank you for your understanding.

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.
